p: Quinoa-based proteins can be considered a rich source of bioactive peptides to which they are attributed important health benefits and strong antioxidant and antimicrobial activities, what was reflected in its incorporation through nanoliposomes in fresh beef burgers [ 79]. This is also the case of fish skin peptides, marine byproducts and natural antioxidants, applied as biopreservative through lecithin nanoliposomes in pork patties [ 76].
